name: GZCLP Tier 1 — Wave Progression (~19 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 5 sets x ~30-45s each + 3-5 min rest between sets => ~18-20 min total
spec_movement: squat, bench press, deadlift, overhead press
overview_and_execution: Begin with 5×3+ (last set AMRAP), add weight each session until failing base volume (15 total). Then drop to 6×2+, then 10×1+ if needed. After failing 10 singles, test a new 5RM and restart at ~85% of it.
example_application: If starting squat T1 at 185 lb for 5×3+, add 10 lb each time until you miss 15 total reps. Then reduce rep scheme to 6×2+ and continue similarly.
important_notes: Avoid exceeding ~10 reps on AMRAP sets. Keep 1–2 reps in reserve. Once volume goals are missed, move to the next rep wave.
volume_metrics: Ranges from 5×3 (15 reps) to 6×2 (12 reps) and 10×1 (10 reps) per session.
